title: 美国银行允许进入中国了？没人讨论啊，事情不大吗？
contents:
应该是真的，为什么好像没有这一条一样，这就是特朗普说的结构性变化吧？好像被无视了？还是大家都不相信这会执行。
这是不是意味着以后拿国内的身份证在国内开设美元账户可以实现了，货币兑换呢？能在美国银行兑换中国的外汇吗？
这一条比不上几百亿的农产品贸易吗？感觉是为以后大乱做准备，有稳定的银行才有稳定的秩序，妥妥的一盘大棋啊。

https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2019/12/13/big-takeaways-trumps-phase-one-china-trade-deal/

In financial services, U.S. banks and credit card companies have long wanted to enter the Chinese market, but they could do it only by forming a joint venture with Chinese firms, something many were hesitant to do.

This deal gives Wall Street firms what they wanted.

What we know so far is this: Trump agreed to scale back some tariffs (which was China’s top demand and was cheered on Wall Street). In exchange, China said it will buy more U.S. farm products (which Beijing had wanted to do anyway), enhance its intellectual property protections and allow U.S. banks and credit card companies full access to China.

在我看来，应该是要取消外资银行的所有限制，和国内银行一样，可以提供人民币支付存款理财的服务，visa和Mastercard[url=https://www.google.com/search?sxsrf=ACYBGNTioNjX_g1pJ82oJhQmhdhMUKszcw:1576305606400&q=Mastercard&stick=H4sIAAAAAAAAAONgFuLUz9U3MMwuzMpTAjONDJPMi7T4nPNzc_PzgjNTUssTK4sXsXL5JhaXpBYlJxal7GBlBADVd2y7OAAAAA&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjijej9w7TmAhUtzjgGHQ51Br4QxA0wLXoECBYQBQ&sxsrf=ACYBGNTioNjX_g1pJ82oJhQmhdhMUKszcw:1576305606400][/url]可以和银联公平竞争。
